---
title: "Customization Guide"
---

## Replace Logos

Replace the placeholder logos with your own:

1. **Client Logo** (`client-logo.png`): Displays in the top-left navbar
2. **Organization Logo** (`my-logo.png`): Displays in the top-right navbar

Recommended size: Height of 30-40px works well. PNG format with transparency is ideal.

## Update Site Title

Edit `_quarto.yml`:

```yaml
website:
  title: "Your Site Title Here"
```

## Update Footer

Edit `_quarto.yml`:

```yaml
page-footer:
  left: "Powered by Your Organization Name"
```

## Update Logo Links

Edit `_quarto.yml` to change where the top-right logo links to:

```yaml
navbar:
  right:
    - text: |
        <img src="my-logo.png" style="height: 30px; vertical-align: middle;" alt="My Logo">
      href: "https://yourwebsite.com"
```

## Add New Pages

1. Create a new `.qmd` file (e.g., `my-page.qmd`)
2. Add it to the sidebar in `_quarto.yml`:

```yaml
sidebar:
  contents:
    - text: "Home"
      href: index.qmd
    - text: "My New Page"
      href: my-page.qmd
```

## Add Sections

Group pages into sections in `_quarto.yml`:

```yaml
sidebar:
  contents:
    - section: "Getting Started"
      contents:
        - href: intro.qmd
          text: Introduction
        - href: setup.qmd
          text: Setup
```

## Grid Layout

Adjust content width in `_quarto.yml`:

```yaml
format:
  html:
    grid:
      sidebar-width: 280px    # Left sidebar width
      body-width: 1100px       # Main content width
      margin-width: 220px      # Right TOC width
      gutter-width: 1rem       # Gap between columns
```
